about_the_game:
In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set! For those of you that have been with us since the beginning, this bundle is a way to support System Era and future content updates for Astroneer. Do you feel a little guilty when we announce another roadmap filled with free updates every year? Here is a little way to thank us and ensure we can keep making awesome content.

This bundle includes three Suits as well as the Vintage palette and visor!

INCLUDED ITEMS
  • Frame Suit
  • Scout Suit
  • Outpost Suit

*Bonus*
  • Vintage Red Palette
  • Vintage Emblem Visor

DISCLAIMER:
If you have previously purchased any of the individual items in the bundle, you will receive the value of the individual items in a QBIT grant automatically within the game for use on future Exo Outfitters purchases! The Vintage set has no QBIT value.

In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set! For those of you that have been with us since the beginning, this bundle is a way to support System Era and future content updates for Astroneer. Do you feel a little guilty when we announce another roadmap filled with free updates every year? Here is a little way to thank us and ensure we can keep making awesome content.

This bundle includes three Suits as well as the Vintage palette and visor!

INCLUDED ITEMS

*Bonus*

DISCLAIMER:
If you have previously purchased any of the individual items in the bundle, you will receive the value of the individual items in a QBIT grant automatically within the game for use on future Exo Outfitters purchases! The Vintage set has no QBIT value.
name: ASTRONEER Suit Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
